messages.title: WORKING FOR WOLVERHAMPTON
messages.content: Wolverhampton is still a great city to live and work in. The last year has been difficult for many families in Wolverhampton. Many residents have lost their jobs and those who have not, live in fear that they will. We need to get Wolverhampton working again. Our vital local services need protecting. I will stand up for our doctors and nurses, our police officers and for our teachers. They should not be making the decisions, not faceless paper pushers who have never spent any time in a hospital or class room or on the beat.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will stand up for our doctors and nurses, our police officers and for our teachers.
I will campaign for more police out on the streets, less police paperwork, zero tolerance on graffiti and stop prisoner early release schemes.
I will continue to be a campaigner who will fight for our local services - our hospital, post offices, GPs, local shops and businesses.

politicalExperience.achievements: I have worked to be a strong and effective voice, championing the West Wolverhampton constituency, bringing investment and jobs.

contactInformation.address: Wolverhampton Conservative Party, Carver Building, Neachells Lane, Wolverhampton, WV1 3QQ
